channel.title: Emergancy Help. Connection error
channel.description:
Here is my question. I bought a VPS and put all my stuff in it and it is working great. When I connect from my laptop I get 0 lag. When I use my desktop I get 0 lag. My friend gets extreme lag. Most people login then lose connection. My other friend is fine too. Why is this happening?
What I have tried: Increasing RAM used for server Added more port access and some other stuff I forgot.

item.title: Emergancy Help. Connection error
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

Here is my question. I bought a VPS and put all my stuff in it and it is working great. When I connect from my laptop I get 0 lag. When I use my desktop I get 0 lag. My friend gets extreme lag. Most people login then lose connection. My other friend is fine too. Why is this happening?

What I have tried:
Increasing RAM used for server
Added more port access and some other stuff I forgot.

Read full topic
